biotools.summary: Web-based application used to conduct probabilistic reverse dosimetry calculations. The tool is used for estimating a distribution of exposure concentrations likely to have produced biomarker concentrations measured in a population. Here we define biomarkers as the chemical or its metabolites that can be measured in human tissues or fluids.

bioschemas.name: PROcEED
